attributes.action: Make all schools start at 10 am to allow teenagers to sleep better
attributes.additional_details: Schools don’t do it individually as they don’t care about our wellbeing enough but something must be done to prevent depression and other mental health issues in children/teens.
attributes.background: force schools to make its begin at 10 am as everyone is tired and not working to there full potential however if they get a longer lie in nobody is as tired and sleep deprived

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign: '10 O'clock Start Times For Schools'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627907
